text: taaki tum samajho (ai rasool) kya tum ne un logon ke haal par nazar nahee kee jo maut ke dar ke maare apane gharon se nikal bhaage aur vah hazaaro aadamee the to khuda ne un se pharamaaya ki sab ke sab mar jao (aur vah mar gae) phir khuda na unhen jinda kiya beshak khuda logon par bada meharabaan hai magar aksar log usaka shukr nahin karate
